attributes.action: Start a regulatory body for Tooth Fairies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has come to my attention recently that is no governance of tooth fairies and it appears to be some kind of postcode lottery as too how much is left.

I can understand that teeth vary in quality but my daughter who looks after her teeth, eats few sweets and brushes twice a day was only left £1 whilst another child from her class that stuffs his face sweets constantly recieved £15!!

Some kind of body similar to ofcom should be established to ensure that the children who are most deserving recive a fair amount or maybe even intorducing some kind of means testing.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
